title: How to Prepare a No Bake Cheesecake

steps.headline: Let butter and cream cheese sit at room temperature for about 30 minutes to soften.
Crush Marie biscuits and mix them well with butter.
Spread the mixture on the aluminum tray and press hard to form the base.
Mix sugar with cream cheese in a mixing bowl.
Boil water, add gelatin and turn heat down.
steps.description: Keep stirring on low heat until gelatin dissolves.

steps.headline: Add the cream cheese and sugar mixture.
Pour mixture onto chilled biscuit base in tray.
Chill cheesecake until set and garnish edges with strawberry halves or any desired fruits before serving.

text: Let butter and cream cheese sit at room temperature for about 30 minutes to soften.  Crush Marie biscuits and mix them well with butter.  Spread the mixture on the aluminum tray and press hard to form the base. Put base in the fridge Mix sugar with cream cheese in a mixing bowl.  Boil water, add gelatin and turn heat down. Keep stirring on low heat until gelatin dissolves. Add the cream cheese and sugar mixture.  Keep stirring until mixture boils.  Pour mixture onto chilled biscuit base in tray.  Chill cheesecake until set and garnish edges with strawberry halves or any desired fruits before serving.  Finished.
